Smoking status is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Smoker
* Smoking status
* Smoking

#### Uses

Smoking status is used by the model in the following places

* [Time since smoking per year](/model/SmokeSinceStop)
* [Cumulative smoke duration](/model/SmokeDurationCumulative)
* [Total amount smoked in life](/model/SmokeCumulative)
* [Smoking average](/model/SmokeTypicalAmount)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> What is your history with smoking tobacco?

The user has the following answer options

* Never smoked
* Former smoker
* Current smoker


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Smoking status is 3. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change now, but it has once definitely been in your control*
